scenario_text.value:
Well, there don’t seem to be any hidden
devices.

Well of course not! Her Majesty’s not hiding
there, she’s in another...
Oh, uh... Forget I said anything!

Oh, no. I don’t think so. If you know where
she is, you should just tell us.
But you really do know, don’t you?
I said I didn’t know, okay?!

And I don’t have time to keep arguing with
you about this!
It’s time for you to go! So long!
Hmph! Her Majesty isn’t hiding in there!
